SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Engineering Department relative to Management Team?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total absenteeism rate?

VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Management Team}.

NC.Q: Was the total Absenteeism Rate in 2012 higher or lower than in 2015?
NC.A: The total absenteeism rate in 2012 was {higher} than in 2015.

NC.Q: Between 2014 and 2015, was the average total Absenteeism Rate higher or lower than between 2014 and 2018?
NC.A: The average total absenteeism rate between 2014 and 2015 was {higher} than between 2014 and 2018.

NC.Q: Between 2013 and 2019, did the total Absenteeism Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2012 and 2014?
NC.A: The change in total absenteeism rate between 2013 and 2019 was {larger} than between 2012 and 2014.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Engineering Department, Management Team, Research & Development}.
